member.name: IMFNetResourceFilter.OnRedirect
member.summary: Called when the byte stream redirects to a URL.
member.param: The URL to which the connection has been redirected.
To cancel the redirection, set this parameter to VARIANT_TRUE. To allow the redirection, set this parameter to VARIANT_FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFNetResourceFilter.OnSendingRequest
member.summary: Called when the byte stream requests a URL.
member.param: The URL that the byte stream is requesting.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFNetResourceFilter
member.summary: Notifies the application when a byte stream requests a URL, and enables the application to block URL redirection.
